                   <div class="describe">借记卡专享~</div>
        
                    <div class="baoliao-block">
                        </div>

              <div class="baoliao-block"> <div class="name"><strong class="one-line">小编说：</strong></div><p itemprop="description">即日起至2025年3月31日，用户点直达链接跳转至中国银行APP，可参与<span style="color: rgb(187, 2, 0);"><strong>8折银联优惠券</strong></span>领取活动。8折银联优惠券分别为“最高立减2元”和“最高立减5元”两档，每人每月仅限领取1份礼品。奖品数量有限，先到先得，领完即止。</p><p itemprop="description"><img itemprop="image" alt="中国银行 手机银行免费领券" src="https://qny.smzdm.com/202503/01/67c2886d7b7663605.png_e600.jpg" _size="726770" title="" data-title=""></p> </div>

                                        <!-- 已点赞 -->
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-up"></i> -->
                                    </div>
                                    <!-- 点踩 --> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增点踩按钮 start --> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class J_cai 删除class caiNum -->
                                    <div class="J_cai comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan ">
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-down-o-thin"></i> -->
                                        <!-- 已点踩 -->
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-down"></i> -->
                                        <i class="icon-thumb-down-o-thin"></i>                                        <!--FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 取消点踩提示 start -->
                                        <div class="tips-down">
                                            <div class="content">
                                                取消点踩展示评论
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="arrow">
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                        <!--FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 取消点踩提示 end -->
                                    </div>
                                    <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增点踩按钮 end -->
                                    <!-- 回复 -->
                                    <div class="J_replay comment-main-list-item-content-info-replay">回复</div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- 展示出的回复框 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea">
                                <!-- 回复表单 在隐藏域中填写参数 -->
                                <form class="comment-quick-form" onsubmit="return false;" method="post" action="">

                                    <input type="hidden" name="comment_type" value="">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="pid" value="142247615">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="parentid" value="340988598">
                                    <textarea name="content" placeholder="回复给九河下梢儿"></textarea>
                                </form>
                                <!-- 表情包及表单提交操作 -->

                                        </a>

                                        <img class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-medal" src="https://qneimg.smzdm.com/202501/15/6787673573a7e8002.png" alt="">
                                                                    </div>
                                
                                <!-- 浮层 -->
                                <div id="actionBox" class="margin-right-15">
                                    <i class="J_more icon-more action-sheet-icon"></i>
                                    <div class="action-sheet">
                                        <a class="jubao" href="javascript:void(0);" id="report_341260703" style="display:inline-block">举报</a>
                                        <!-- 删除, 折叠评论不展示5160136894-->
                                                                            </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- 评论内容 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-comment padding-right-10">
                                <!-- 置顶标签 -->
                                                                <span>每次五块</span>
                                <!-- radio_3_4 宽高比例3:4 -->
                                <!-- data-radio值 0 4:3，  1 1:1，  2 3:4 -->

                            <!-- 用户信息 及点赞操作 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-info">
                                <div class="content-info"> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class content-info -->
                                    <span>03-04 16:12</span>
                                                                            <span>·</span>
                                        <span>重庆</span>
                                                                  
                                </div>
                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论的文案 start -->
                                <div class="user-downed-fold">
                                    <i class="icon-info-mark-o"></i>该评论被折叠
                                </div>
                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论的文案 end -->
                                <div class="content-operation"> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class content-operation -->

                                    <!-- 点赞后嵌套 class red -->
                                    <div class="J_zan comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan" id="cdc_support_341260703" data-item="3, 1, 341260703, 142247615, 341260703">

                                        <!-- 已点赞 -->

                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-down-o-thin"></i> -->

                                </div>

                                    <i class="icon-info-mark-o"></i>该评论被折叠
                                </div>
                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论的文案 end -->
                                <div class="content-operation"> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class content-operation -->
                                
                                                                        <!-- 点赞 -->
                                    <div class="J_zan comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan" id="cdc_support_341183423" data-item="3, 1, 341183423, 142247615, 341183423">
                                        <span></span>
                                        <i class="icon-thumb-up-o-thin"></i>
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-up"></i> -->
                                    </div>
                                    <!-- 点踩 --> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增点踩按钮 start --> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class J_cai 删除class caiNum -->
                                    <div class="J_cai comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan ">
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-down-o-thin"></i> -->
                                        <!-- 已点踩 -->
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-down"></i> -->
                                        <i class="icon-thumb-down-o-thin"></i>                                        <!--FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 取消点踩提示 start -->
                                        <div class="tips-down">
                                            <div class="content">
                                                取消点踩展示评论
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="arrow">
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                        <!--FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 取消点踩提示 end -->

                                    </div>

                                    <!-- 回复 -->
                                    <div class="J_replay comment-main-list-item-content-info-replay">回复</div>
                                </div>
                            </div>

                            <!-- 展示出的回复框 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea">
                                <!-- 回复表单 在隐藏域中填写参数 -->
                                <form class="comment-quick-form" onsubmit="return false;" method="post" action="">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="type" value="3">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="comment_type" value="">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="pid" value="142247615">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="parentid" value="340988598">
                                    <textarea name="content" placeholder="回复给九河下梢儿"></textarea>
                                </form>
                                <!-- 表情包及表单提交操作 -->
                                <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea-opertion">
                                    <div class="comment_smileBox">
                                        <i class="icon-expression"></i>
                                        <div class="smileLayerBg" id="smiley" style="display: none;"></div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div>
                                        <p>校验提示文案</p>
                                        <div class="J_submit">提交</div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <!-- 二级评论 -->
                        <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-reply">
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-reply-container">
                                                            </div>
                                                    </div>
                    </div>
                </li>
                
                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论说明 start -->
                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论说明 end -->

            </ul>
                        <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠的评论 end -->
            <!-- 分页样式 -->
                    </div>
    </div>
    <!-- 评论列表 end -->
    
</section>
<!-- 删除评论的二次确认弹窗 -->
